```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Tabela

```{r}
renderTable({ iris %>% head()})
 
```

Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Gráfico de Dispersão

```{r}

renderPlot({
  iris_tbl <- as_tibble(iris)

ggplot(iris_tbl) +
  aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width)+
  geom_point()
})


```

### Gráfico2

```{r}

renderPlot({
  iris_tbl <- as_tibble(iris)

ggplot(iris_tbl) +
  aes(y = Sepal.Length, col = Species)+
  geom_boxplot()
})


```
